name: Bench Press
description: A compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Dumbbell Press
description: A chest exercise performed with dumbbells to build strength and muscle.

name: Cable Flies
description: An isolation exercise that targets the chest muscles using a cable machine.

name: Pull-Up
description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the back, shoulders, and arms.

name: DeadLift
description: A compound lift that works the entire posterior chain, including the back, glutes, and hamstrings.

name: Row
description: A back exercise that can be performed with a barbell, dumbbell, or machine to target the lats and upper back.

name: Pull-Down
description: A machine-based exercise that targets the latissimus dorsi.

name: T-Bar Row
description: A back exercise performed with a T-bar row machine or barbell to target the middle back.

name: Straight Arm Pulldown
description: An isolation exercise for the lats performed with a cable machine.

name: Squat
description: A compound lower body exercise that targets the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Leg-Extensions
description: An isolation exercise that targets the quadriceps using a leg extension machine.

name: Leg-Press
description: A machine-based exercise that targets the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Leg-Curls
description: An isolation exercise that targets the hamstrings using a leg curl machine.

name: Bulgarian Split Squats
description: A unilateral leg exercise that targets the quads, glutes, and hamstrings.

name: Barbell Curls
description: An isolation exercise that targets the biceps using a barbell.

name: Hammer Curls
description: A bicep exercise performed with dumbbells, targeting the brachialis and forearms.

name: Dumbbell Curls
description: Basic variation of curls that targets the biceps.

name: Preacher Curls
description: An isolation bicep exercise performed on a preacher bench to minimize momentum.

name: Concentration Curls
description: An isolation bicep exercise performed seated with a dumbbell.

name: Push Down Machine
description: A tricep isolation exercise performed using a cable machine.

name: B-Skull Crushers
description: A tricep exercise performed with a barbell overhead to target the long head of the tricep.

name: D-Skull Crushers
description: A tricep exercise performed with a dumbbell overhead to target the long head of the tricep.

name: Cable Press Down
description: Exercise targets the triceps by extending the arms fully, pressing a bar or rope attachment down toward the thighs.

name: Shoulder Press
description: A shoulder exercise performed with dumbbells to target the deltoids.

name: Front Raises
description: An isolation exercise that targets the front deltoids.

name: Lateral Raise
description: An isolation exercise that targets the lateral deltoids.

name: Cable Pulls
description: A shoulder exercise performed with a cable machine to target the rear deltoids.

name: Dips
description: A compound exercise that targets the chest and triceps.
